cause.description:
Our mission is to support the reinstation of Northern Ireland to the Republic of Ireland, and to support the banishment of Sectarianism and Loyalism.
1. Reinstation must occur by any means possible
2. All actions of Óglaigh na hÉireann are justified
cause.mission: Reinstate the 6 counties in the North into the Republic
cause.name: Republican Sinn Fein Canada
